data.persona: I am a traveler.  I travel from city to city finding work where I can while enjoying the local cuisine.  I don't put down roots.  I come and go as I please, much like the wind.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned mine entrance.
The abandoned mine is located in a field with a few trees. It is unable to be seen from far away. The closer you get the more you  notice the ground caving in around the hole. When you peer down into the mine, you see crumbling walls and concrete and a hole so deep you can't see where it ends.
There's a piece of miner's robe ripped on the sides and some ore here.

You are carrying a block and tackle, and wearing a ripped shirt.

data.short_motivation: I need to sell the ore
data.mid_motivation: I have to get money to finance my travel expenses
data.long_motivation: I am planning to move to another city
